# 1/4 times π

> One fourth times the mathematical constant [π][pi].

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var FOURTH_PI = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/float64-fourth-pi' );
```

#### FOURTH_PI

One fourth times the mathematical constant [π][pi].

```javascript
var bool = ( FOURTH_PI === 7.85398163397448309616e-1 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

